definitions.definition: Legible , possible to read or at least decipher.
examples: If that sign were still readable we'd know where we are!

definitions.definition: Which can be read—i.e. accessed or played—by a certain technical type of device.
examples: No sale, those aren't readable with my DVD-player!

definitions.definition: Enjoyable to read, of an acceptable stylistic quality or at least functionally composed.
examples: These assembly instructions aren't readable , I still don't have a clue how to start!

main_definition: ( of handwriting , print , etc ) Legible , possible to read or at least decipher.
secondary_definitions: Which can be read—i.e. accessed or played—by a certain technical type of device.
( of a book ) Enjoyable to read, of an acceptable stylistic quality or at least functionally composed.
